name: Stitch Battle Royale!
description:
⚔stitch game battle royal!⚔

controls: asdw to move. use 1 for pistol, use 2 for Rifle, use 3 for shotgun. click to shoot! ..........this game is gonna lag hard ._.

note: THIS GAME CAN CRASH!

                       ( why i made this game. )

i made this game because i was playing a game called Imposter battle royale it's basically among us but battle royale i was so addicted to it (kinda) that i decided to make a stitch version (tho the imposter battle royale is better then it) if you want to try Imposter battle royale then click here! https://www.crazygames.com/game/imposter-battle-royale?utm_source=https%3A%2F%2F...
